title: (x) Nike Total 90 - FF DIN Condensed {Yves}
content:
Hi guys, can anyone help me identify the 'Total 90' font? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112200915im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68395.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Scrappin Fabulous script - BaaBookHmk {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112200915/http:/typophile.com/node/10007 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 'gloria' sans serif - Samsumi {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112200915/http:/typophile.com/node/10027 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: You mean the number 90? What about [FF DIN Condensed Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112200915/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11201.3.12&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=90&sampleSize=96)?
